channel.title: Need a little bit of help
channel.description:
With the recent loss of information of the forums im left in the dark about making a server. Im not gonna ask how to completely make it, but just a couple of noobish questions. I hope you can bear this.
When i try to compile my server source it says javac is not a recognized command. I have Java Developing kit 6 update 4 so that 'might' be it. And i need to make an npc yell whenever someone logs in. Thank you for your time and by the way what exactly happend to the forums?

item.title: Need a little bit of help
item.dc:creator: @njr99 njr99
item.description:
@njr99 wrote:

hampster in the beggining it says jdk 6.0.0.1 change that 1 to a 2 or 3 depending on what one you have ^

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little bit of help

item.title: Need a little bit of help
item.dc:creator: @hamster40 hamster40
item.description:
@hamster40 wrote:

Songoty when i posted this the tutorial section was still blank. And njr99 how would you edit fire wolfs compiler for my source?

Ah by the way i do have JDK and i configured the compiler to my update, but still “error writing file”

Yet another update, i tried your method songoty but still “error writing file”

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little bit of help

item.title: Need a little bit of help
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

Why would you be left in the dark about making a server? The tuts are gone, yes, but moparscape questions are still there, and thats where the big guide on how to make a server is.

Replace your compiler with this

@echo off
title compiler
"C:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac" *.java
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little bit of help

item.title: Need a little bit of help
item.dc:creator: @njr99 njr99
item.description:
@njr99 wrote:

first get jdk go to google and search jdk download
if it still does not work go to google again and search for fire wolfs compiler
edit fire wolfs compiler to the server compiler

Read full topic
